channel.title: About on Lihao (Jasper) Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in About on Lihao (Jasper) Zhang

item.title: About
item.description: Lihao (Jasper) Zhang was borned in Northern China, he growed up in Shandong province with great interests in machine learning, traveling and sports of various kinds including billiards (8 ball & 9 ball), NBA basketball, table tennis and badminton. After three years of FinTech industry experience at Los Angeles, traveling across 15+ U.S national parks and two years’ study to get his MS degree in Statistics from The University of Texas at Austin, Lihao is now a data scientist in the tech consulting area at Shanghai in China.
